full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/18/2023 JACKSON & HERTOGS ATTORNEYS AT LAW ALLEN R. JACKSON SUITE 400 SAN JOSE OFFICE JEFFREY J. RUMMEL 170 COLUMBUS AVENUE SUITE 480 DANIEL H. BLUME SAN FRANCISCO, CA 94133-5114 95 SOUTH MARKET STREET LYNDA WON-CHUNG CLARK M. TREVOR TELEPHONE (415) 986-4559 SAN JOSE. CA 95113-2306 (408)971-0282 EDWIN J. WHITE FACSIMILE (415) 986-187 FAX (408) 971-8108 NORMAN C. PLOTKIN' ERIC G. HOFFMAN ILANA J. DRUMMOND MEMBER LOUISIANA BAR November 17, 1992 Officer In Charge Immigration and Naturalization Service 280 South First Street San Jose, CA 95113 Re: ADVANI, Rukmani D. A20 337 856 Attn: Citizenship Branch Dear Sir/Madam: On or about July 22, 1992, our office submitted Form N-400 for above-named applicant in connection with her petition for naturalization. At the time of filing, we requested an "Hindi" interpreter for Ms. Advani. However, she would like to have an "Sindhi" interpreter to assist her with the application. We would appreciate it if you could amend your record and arrange an "Sindhi" interpreter at the time of the interview. Thank you for your time and attention to this matter. Sincerely yours, Eric G. Hoffman EGH:ch Enc. cc: Rukmani Advani
